name: UpdateGithubPreReceiveEnvironment
description:
Update a pre-receive environment in GitHub Enterprise.

Use this tool to update a specific pre-receive environment in a GitHub Enterprise setup. Note that the default environment cannot be modified.

parameters.name: pre_receive_environment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the pre-receive environment to update.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the pre-receive environment.

parameters.name: tarball_download_url
parameters.description: The URL to download the tarball for the environment update.

value_schema.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

parameters.name: new_environment_name
parameters.description: The new name for the pre-receive environment.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: pre_receive_environment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the pre-receive environment.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the pre-receive environment.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

value_schema.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
